description:
36 new drawings divided in 6 unique themes:
● Beautiful Cats playing in the living room
● The wonders of the Ocean (dolphins, turtle...)
● Cute animals at the farm (pigs, chicks...)
● Girls in a playroom with their dog
● Mighty dinosaurs in a prehistoric world
● Cool trucks and builders at the Construction Site

Get 36 new images to color!
name: Basic Chapter - 36 new drawings (Cats, Ocean, Farm, Girls Room, Construction Site and Dinosaurs)
